game.name: RAKE IN - Scoring Big With Monster Girls!
game.shortDescription: For generations, a legend has been passed down about the mysterious Treasure Island. The island is home to a vast amount of gold... and it could be yours for the taking! Embark on a Monster Girl-catching escapade as you uncover secrets in a riveting search for riches!
game.shortDescriptionEn: For generations, a legend has been passed down about the mysterious Treasure Island. The island is home to a vast amount of gold... and it could be yours for the taking! Embark on a Monster Girl-catching escapade as you uncover secrets in a riveting search for riches!

reviewHighlights.text: Magnificent game, there is plenty to praise that I will probably be thinking about things I forgot to mention once I post this review. It is a fun, sh...
